Reviews.Title: HP laptop 17 inches
Reviews.Author: Esther S. Mendizabal
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my laptop,vey fast....I recomended to everyone. I'm glad I made the choise to get it....

Reviews.Title: Nice large laptop
Reviews.Author: Radford K Stokes
Reviews.Content: A little large if you take it everywhere but for anywhere around home it's great. Probably all you need for a great price & large enough to read

Reviews.Title: Big and Bad.
Reviews.Author: Roger Mounts
Reviews.Content: Very good laptop, it is heavier than I expected and bulky. I like the battery bulge on the bottom as it makes it easier to get it out of my  case. Excellent key board and screen, and as fast as I need to do my work. I am not a techy or a gamer, I can't speak to the graphics or the speed needed for gaming.This is my 3rd laptop and the best I have ever used. The price was right and I would recommend this to a friend. I am very happy with the fact it came with windows 7as I have widows 8 on my desktop and I don't like the new system.

Reviews.Title: It works good so far
Reviews.Author: Kristin G. Godo
Reviews.Content: So far Windows 7 has fired up and is working.  I have uploaded all my files from a USB drive. But I haven't decided which anti virus to use yet.  It let me put off that decission until later.I like the way that the fan is situated over the CPU and the way the vents are designed.  I hope that this design will not cause a lint buildup over time that causes overheating.  It looks well designed and open to the air. The fan is quiet and doesn't blow much air.

Reviews.Title: happy
Reviews.Author: mcfly
Reviews.Content: very happy with laptop... I did a ton of research and this was the best price.  Also the smarttade warranty offered with it was a WAY better deal than ANY other warranty I looked at it and offers better service.I was able to get this laptop 2nd day delivery.  It was packaged super safe.

Reviews.Title: HP Laptop
Reviews.Author: sue
Reviews.Content: My HP laptop does everything I wanted and more.  Even my husband who is computer illiterate can use this laptop with ease and loves it.  You can't go wrong on the quality or the price.  Great buy!!!!

Reviews.Title: My 1st HP Laptop vs.My 2nd Dell  Awsome!
Reviews.Author: soundman
Reviews.Content: This is my(first)HP Laptop after owning (2) previous Dell laptops = my (3rd) Laptop within 6 years. I've deceied to go with the HP after gathering plenty of info from many resourses well over a year now. The Features & Specs here got my attention. After many frustrating & costly issues with Dell,I've deceied to go with HP since the've been the business since ( 1939 ) After purchasing this from the shopping network ( QVC ) I'm pleased & impressed with the results. More to come later.

Reviews.Title: The Wi Fi doesnt work
Reviews.Author: Alvaro Sï¿½nchez
Reviews.Content: This laptop does not work with WI-FI. It came damaged and was exported to Costa Rica, is very difficult and expensive to enforce the guarantee

Reviews.Title: absolute junk
Reviews.Author: BRIAN CAMPBELL`
Reviews.Content: Havent found anything that works for any length of time this is the 2nd one ive had first one lasted 3 days b4 it quit the tech support was so bad they told me to contact the local cable company to set up email because they couldn't do it but anything else

Reviews.Title: Buy Another Model
Reviews.Author: MV
Reviews.Content: This computer has trouble loading pages, closing pages, adding a tab, streaming a movie, etc. If you load a page (such as Amazon), you will get a pop up box telling you that Internet Explorer has trouble loading the page. Then you wait while it searches for a solution. Then it tells you that it cannot load the page because there is a problem with the page. Sites I try to use? Amazon, Barnes and Noble, Netflix, and Yahoo Mail. After restarting, you may finally load a page. Then, it will shut down in the middle of what you are trying to do. Very time consuming and frustrating. I tried Firefox and no improvement. I had limited time to play with this and was too patient. Should have returned ASAP.
